item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:88 Chances: Retail engagement materially accelerated in the first quarter, the report said. Synovus (SNV) unveils a payment solution, Accelerate Pay, to enable commercial banking clients to initiate account payable payments, while eliminating check payments. For long-term growth investors, these three stocks stand out in a crowded field.
